resources.string:
The object of the game is to prevent the ball from falling to the ground and exits the sides of the screen. For this you must touch the ball with your finger. 
To push the ball in a specific direction, press on the screen at the opposite direction. 
 Depending on the level of difficulty chosen, you will get more or less points per touch: 
 - Easy: 1 point per touch. 
 - Medium: 2 points per touch. 
 - Hard: 3 points per touch. 

 You can get it! 

 Creator: Alejandro Exp√≥sito Ortiz 
 Version: 1.0 
 Creation date: 23/02/2021
